sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator = Class.create();
FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(FxCurrencyConfigFieldChoiceListGenerator, {
    initialize: function(numLevels) {
		FxCurrencyConfigFieldChoiceListGenerator.prototype.initialize.call(this, numLevels);
    },

	shouldAddField: function(ed) {
		return (ed.getInternalType() == 'string' || (ed.isReference() && ed.getReference() == 'fx_currency'));
	},

	shouldRecurse: function(ed) {
		return (ed.isReference() && ed.getReference() != 'fx_currency');
	},	

	type: 'FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-25 18:40:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>747c9f2ef37233009f6f301e73612bfe</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FxCurrencyConfigReferenceSourceGenerator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="FX Currency" source="com.glide.currency2">c40e380f6d2220100acb70b3534330ca</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_747c9f2ef37233009f6f301e73612bfe</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-08 21:53:29</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>613</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
